import React, { useState } from "react"; function Progress ({isTimerRunning, isPaused}) { if (isTimerRunning || isPaused) { return (

{sessionType === "Focus" ? `Focusing for ${minutesToDuration(focusTime)} minutes` : `On Break for ${minutesToDuration(breakTime)} minutes`}

{secondsToDuration(sessionTime)}

) } } export default Progress;
